definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: We're all going to be Japanese collaborators. Even the dogs you Fangs keep stand by justice and righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 我們全要做漢奸，只有你方家養的狗都深明大義的。

sentences.english: Wang Jinbiao said that foreign to the devil, we called traitors.
sentences.chinese: 王金彪說外國來的叫鬼子，我們叫漢奸。

sentences.english: We make a distinction between such people with a dual character and the traitors and pro-Japanese elements.
sentences.chinese: 將這種兩面派分子，和漢奸親日派加以區別。

sentences.english: Subterranean party assassinates the task that traitor Su Chun comes to to fall on Liu pillar body.
sentences.chinese: 地下黨暗殺漢奸蘇春來的任務落在了劉棟樑身上。

sentences.english: The despot and traitor was brought to public trial during the land reform and all his crimes were exposed.
sentences.chinese: 土改時公審了那個惡霸兼漢奸，並揭露了其全部罪行。

sentences.english: Today's evil comprador forces are traitors.
sentences.chinese: 現在的買辦惡勢力就是漢奸。

sentences.english: In front of five characters to a traitor deserved.
sentences.chinese: 前面五個字，以漢奸論罪。

definition: to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
